thread.title: Air China, Cathay Pacific, Thai Airways, and Scoot Flights Cancelled and Delayed Due to Typhoon Kong-rey: New Updated List of Affected Flights
thread.title_full: Air China, Cathay Pacific, Thai Airways, and Scoot Flights Cancelled and Delayed Due to Typhoon Kong-rey: New Updated List of Affected Flights

author: Somudranil Sarkar
title: Air China, Cathay Pacific, Thai Airways, and Scoot Flights Cancelled and Delayed Due to Typhoon Kong-rey: New Updated List of Affected Flights
text:
Several flights were canceled and delayed due to the impact of Typhoon Kong-rey, which brought challenging weather conditions across affected regions. Airlines, including those operating at Changi Airport, were forced to modify schedules in response to the typhoon’s strong winds and heavy rainfall. With safety as a top priority, many flights faced significant delays, while others were canceled entirely to avoid potential risks associated with the severe weather. The disruption affected numerous routes, particularly those heading to and from regions impacted by the storm, underscoring the widespread impact of Typhoon Kong-rey on air travel and the need for precautionary measures in the face of extreme weather events.
